|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SanDisk;; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Micron;MT48LC16M16A2-75-D; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/01/2004 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Senao NL-2511MP PLUS |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Intersil;ISL3874; |rad1chip2 = Intersil;ISL3685; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-TNC |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The device is a Soekris net4501 board with a Senao wireless module and a CompactFlash card (appears to be 128MB). :The stock OS appears to be FreeBSD.
Default settings in this entry (as well as the Ethernet IF OUI) are per the CF card recovered from the pictured (broken) unit..
The included power adapter is a '''Jameco''' DDU120100, P/N DC1210F1 (12VDC, 1000mA). ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate.
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="external"> File:Firetide 1000S angled.jpg|angled File:Firetide 1000S top.jpg|top File:Firetide 1000S bottom.jpg|bottom File:Firetide 1000S label.jpg|label File:Firetide 1000S back.jpg|back File:Firetide 1000S power adapter.jpg|power adapter </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]][[Has images::power adapter| ]] <gallery caption="internal" mode="slideshow"> File:Firetide 1000S board top card in.jpg|board top, card in File:Firetide 1000S Elan CPU.jpg|CPU File:Firetide 1000S board top card out.jpg|board top, card out File:Firetide 1000S eth controller.jpg|Ethernet controller File:Firetide 1000S board ID.jpg|Soekris board ID </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
